text: The handball men's tournament at the 2019 Pan American Games in Lima, Peru was held between 31 July and 5 August 2019. Eight nations participated. == Qualification == A total of eight men's teams qualified to compete at the games in each tournament. The host nation (Peru) qualified in each tournament, along with seven other teams in various qualifying tournaments. ===Summary=== {| class="wikitable" width=800 |- ! Event ! Dates ! Location !
